summary: A collection of utility classes and functions that streamline ANSYS MAPDL post‑processing tasks, including simulation setup, control calculations, data display, listing generation, specialized statistical and signal processing, and status management.
business_intent: Enable engineers to quickly build robust post‑processing workflows in MAPDL by providing reusable, high‑level helpers for configuring variables, extracting results, performing calculations, formatting outputs, and tracking status, thereby reducing development time and minimizing errors.
